data.name: Eternal Exodus Demo
data.detailed_description:
This is a very early, but very playable, preview of the game.

Please be aware that this demo:
  • was built quite a while ago (summer of 2019); much has changed since then
  • contains roughly 1-2 hours of playtime
  • uses placeholder art that will be different in the final game
  • has a few bugs that have since been fixed
  • has save files that won't transfer over to the final game
  • is still a ton of fun despite all that, and the story will leave you itching to find out what happens next
.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Most modern video cards should work
